title: Pease in a Pod
description: Follows the life of family man Mel Pease, his wife Patty, daughter Carrie, son Ben, and dog Chuck.
altHero: Mel and his wife Patty on the couch, they look like Al and Peggy Bundy
alt1: Mel holding a toaster in the kitchen
alt2: Mel’s son Ben holds a blow up doll
alt3: Pease’s neighbors, a flaired political activist and Hawaiian-shirt wearing chill guy
alt4: Mel’s blonde daughter Carrie with two military guys
